credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Project for the rear of a carriage
provenance: From the Collection of Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr and Mrs Edward D. Brandegee
description: Two Atlanted, aided by two putti, hold a canopy over a cave in which a nymph of a source crouches.  A scaffolding rises on top, topped laterally be seated children.  A coat of arms help in the top center before a tasseled cloth by two seated putti.
name: Drawing
